text:
Providence DIG | Seattle WA | Onsite | Java, Node, AWS, Go, Kubernetes

Innovation group working for Catholic non-profit health system. We develop products - right now apps/websites with electronic health record integrations - that improve the healthcare system ecosystem for end users and bring down costs for health systems themselves.

Big selling point: well funded non-profit doing legit Good Things.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Providence_Health_%26_Services 27 hospitals, 5 states. Big system, which I think is really cool.

Not precisely sure what kind of visa/green card/etc support we offer; if that's a concern, I would suggest you "inquire within", as the phrase goes - HR can answer that.

I'm a software engineer there.

https://providence-digitalinnovation.jobs
